website_summaries.verdict: The glass and metal combination creates a stylish look and is reasonably durable, but it isn't for everyone - including consumers with active homes where damage may occur.
pros: Has a sleek design with glass top on gold-finished base
Fits nicely with almost any decor
Assemble is fairly straightforward and doesn't take too much time to complete
cons: Glass could chip and is prone to noticeable fingerprints and smudges
Bottom of metal base has been known to scratch some floor finishes

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase!!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this table! The quality far exceeds the price tag. The faux marble top is beautiful! Very glossy and looks really close to the real thing. It was really easy to put together, took less than 20 mins. I am so happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: PrincessJas9

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: ON TIME SHIPPING!! & THE PRODUCT IS EXACT SAME AS THE PICTURE I️ LOVE LOVE LOVE IT!!! It’s a must buy!
customer_reviews.author: Danni

customer_reviews.title: Love this table!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am super pleased with this table, it looks beautiful, the marble doesn’t look tacky and it only took 5 minutes to put together! It’s exactly what I wanted, in love!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Spann

customer_reviews.title: The perfect, solidly built and easy to put together accent table
customer_reviews.text: I have been in search of an accent table to fit between these two chairs for months it seems. Obviously Target, Home Goods and World Market should make it easier. However that’s not been the case. When I do find one, they want upwards of $100. So I was thrilled to finally find a simple wood top with gold legs here on Amazon. It’s absolutely perfect and I had it put together in less than five minutes.
customer_reviews.author: WamQQk

customer_reviews.title: Table was cut incorrectly and doesn't fit together. Very Disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: When the table arrived, I found that it doesn't fit together correctly. The pieces weren't cut correctly and I did the best I can to make it work since returning is a pain, but it will always wobble because the legs don't sit flush with the floor. I expected more for a $70+ side table. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Lala

customer_reviews.title: Classy!
customer_reviews.text: I love this side table! It looks classy and is the perfect height. It's pretty light weight as well. The top white is made out of some hard plastic. It's not stone, it's just a faux look, but still very pretty.
customer_reviews.author: Jp86

customer_reviews.title: Loving them!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two of these side tables and the matching X-base coffee table. I cannot say how much I love the set, wow! Faux marble looks real enough, all parts arrived intact and on time. Gold is not as shiny as I wanted but the matte finish is growing on me! As someone who dreads the thought of building furniture, assembly was actually super easy and took no more than 15 minutes per table. Very sturdy and sleek and adds the perfect touch to my "glam" themed living room. I would recommend to anyone, the only reason I give 4 stars is because I wish the tables were taller and maybe 1 foot wider in diameter
customer_reviews.author: Liv

customer_reviews.title: So easy to put together and affordable
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the small accent table. It is absolutely gorgeous! So easy to put together abs affordable. It goes great with the rest of my decor. I'm order another for my foyer. Update: So I recently purchased another table and I actually had trouble getting one of the 4 screws into the hole. The paint is easily chipped, I found that out by trying to force the screw into the hole. The screw actually never went into the hole but it wasn't a deal breaker for me, the table still looks great and is still very sturdy. It is a very classy accent to any room!
customer_reviews.author: Jd

customer_reviews.title: I AM OBSESSED!
customer_reviews.text: This was SO easy to put together. I read a review that said it was difficult...NOT true! literally five screws, it comes with everything you need. This table is a BARGAIN. It looks SO chic and I haven't found anything to compare it to with the quality and price. I would recommend this table over and over again, I am literally in LOVE!
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: LOVE IT .... I love this table. I was afraid the top "marble" would look super fake... but it looks great
customer_reviews.author: laelly

customer_reviews.title: Cute tables!
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these, one table was able to be put together in just a few minutes, and the other table had a little difficult in being put together. One screw had trouble fitting into a slightly defective opening (wasn't large enough) but I just rotated the circle frame a bit to match a different leg and kind of jammed it in there. One table was also missing one of the rubber tabs that the glass drops onto, unfortunately, but it sits in the frame just fine (nothing a little piece of folded tape couldn't fix). Overall a decent buy for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia

customer_reviews.title: Great table for the price
customer_reviews.text: This table is EXACTLY what I was looking for to put in my living room. Its a great size and looks much more expensive than what it was. It was easy to put together and included everything for the job. I will say, it's not sturdy enough to rest your feet on, it feels somewhat wobbily for that, buuuut I think it's too elegant and nice to be kicking back on anyway. Instead I got 2 matching poufs to fit underkneath to pull out for my feet. This table is a great addition especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Elissa VanKirk

customer_reviews.title: 100 % garbage and made of Formaldehyde! Complete waste of money
customer_reviews.text: This is literally the worst Amazon Purchase I have ever made.It is so lousy and cheap I literally started laughing when I unboxed it.It is literally like a Toy.It should have been $10.It is made of Paper and aluminum foil.It also has toxic Formaldehyde in the ply-board.The fact that this was $65 should be Illegal.It is pure and utter garbage.The bolts did not tighten,they did not fit,the cheap paint was worn off.The top literally feels like cardboard.Garbage and going to return.
customer_reviews.author: MAC LAB

customer_reviews.title: Check for lifting/chipping of faux marble material. Easy assembly & nice looking.
customer_reviews.text: 3Stars...The faux marble table top is damaged around the edge. The paint alongside the edge is chipped and lifting. Shipping box in poor condition. The rest of the table parts are fine and it was easy to assemble. Hoping for a replacement tabletop only as I don’t want to disassemble the entire table to return.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great use for my bedside table
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a small bedside table and this worked out perfectly. The height and size turned out better than I expected. Small enough so it doesn't overtake the side of my bed, and tall enough where I didn't have to reach too far to access it. It was very easy to assemble and the glass top itself just simply sits on rubber buttons. I never had any issues of the glass sliding off. Overall I am very satisified.
customer_reviews.author: Jeomite

customer_reviews.title: This coffee table is absolutely perfect! Great size for my apartment living room
customer_reviews.text: This coffee table is absolutely perfect! Great size for my apartment living room. I spent weeks looking at expensive options and finally decided to order this one which I had been eyeing online. You never know what the quality will be, but this is absolutely amazing! It compares and exceeds the $500+ options I was looking at in furniture stores.
customer_reviews.author: britney sauer

customer_reviews.title: Works, but pictures misleading
customer_reviews.text: If you look at the pictures of the table in the advertisement, it appears to have a shine to the table, either a glass top, or clear laminate on top, but it wasn't. The legs are sturdy, however the top seems like a cheap piece of compressed board with a cheap laminate on top. If you are looking just to use it as a decoration and not to sit anything on it, then it does the job. However, if you set a drink on it, I imagine it would warp in no time flat. Definitely not worth the price. Especially since I have seen others with glass tops and nice frames at other places for around the same price.
customer_reviews.author: Laura G.

customer_reviews.title: decent table made of cheap materials
customer_reviews.text: I got this table to go next to my reading chair, to put my tea and phone on. It was very easy to assemble and it arrived in good condition. I paid $55 for it and I do think it was overpriced. The gold legs are not very shiny gold, and the top is cheap material with a "marble" print. Overall, I'm happy with it because I wasn't willing to spend any more money on a nicer table.
customer_reviews.author: AshFinny

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality, a little top-heavy, but great buy
customer_reviews.text: We’ve been looking for a specific sized table for a while. The tables I’ve found while in a brick and mortar store have been unimpressive or made of inferior wood. Needless to say, I was prepared to return this product if needed. Right from the unboxing, the table is impressive. The top is vaneered, however it doesn’t feel thin or cheap like most vaneers. The metal isn’t matte nor extremely shiny, just polished nicely. The bottom sits squarely on the floor without being uneven. It may be a little top-heavy for anyone with little kids. Overall, we really like the design of the table and would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqui

customer_reviews.title: Came in Great Condition
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice coffee table. It fits my space as expected. Make sure before buying it you really measure the space you want it to be in and compare it to the table measurements. It was really easy to assemble. It took me about 10 minutes or less. It came in great condition and was packaged really well. There were some minor cosmetic blemishes on the metal frames but not noticeable enough to make the table not worth it. I really think this table is worth it! Also shipping was pretty fast of 3 days through USPS from California to where I live in Nevada.
customer_reviews.author: Celeste H.

customer_reviews.title: Nice design, it enhances the room
customer_reviews.text: Although the frame material isn’t high quality, the design does enhance the room. Dimensions: Diameter: 90 cm Height: 48 cm Frame material: I would say it is painted Aluminum (no idea if the color will last) Frame Color: as described (opaque gold) No scratches on it, arrived perfectly. Really really easy to assemble, 5 screws and that’s all. I live in Mexico ... so taking into account the shipping expenses, cost-benefit ratio wasn’t that good. But I do like this coffee table and I definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Samanta

customer_reviews.title: Sleek modern design...great value
customer_reviews.text: I love this table...it look more expensive than it easy. It was very easy to assembly even with very cryptic instructions ( seller needs to review and enhance) and I put it together in less than 10 minutes. The table is sturdy. The glass too sits on top of the table, so be careful other than that it is great— I have four other side tables similar to this one and will be looking to purchase a center table.
customer_reviews.author: Diva M

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THIS. I was nervous because I was afraid it would look awful for the price. It looks surprisingly good. I loved the coffee table so much that I also got the side table to use as a plant stand. It's heavy, sturdy, and it doesn't look expensive but I would believe you if you told me it cost twice what I paid. There was a small scuff on one leg but not noticeable enough to bother me at all. I'm just sorry I wasted so much time thinking about it.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: Not as glamorous as I was expecting.
customer_reviews.text: You're definitely getting what you're paying for. I do have to say, I like the size, and I thought it was made to be very easily put together which I appreciated. My dislikes: I found it almost $20 cheaper on Wayfair right after it got delivered to my home and it looks cheaply made. The marble top is matte, completely ruining it for me. The legs also are painted a matte gold color instead of being shiny which I would have preferred. I did like the fast shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Katarina

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Easy to put together, sturdy and looks great!
customer_reviews.author: M. Hebert

customer_reviews.title: If I could give this less than 1 star I would
customer_reviews.text: When I received this item it was immediately evident that it is very poorly made. The legs are uneven, so after I put it together not only is it extremely not sturdy, but it rocks every time you touch it. I submitted a return request, and they wanted me to send pictures of their faulty product to prove it's condition before providing a pre-paid shipping label to return it. Not sure why they even want it back when it's unusable.
customer_reviews.author: Scottie & Natalie Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Fills the space nicely!
customer_reviews.text: Received this side table today and it was very easy to assemble. Definitely adds to your space. The only issue I had with mine is that it was uneven once assembled, meaning it wobbled slightly but I had felt pads handy from previous items to stick under so it didn’t wobble. I debating sending it back for this issue but it was an easy fix and the rest of the frame and glass etc were perfect. Got it mainly for my plant but it would be a great addition to bedroom furniture as well. Recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Olivia Walker

customer_reviews.title: Super cute, but noticeably fake
customer_reviews.text: I bought this is a really affordable coffee table for my office. A lot of the reviews I read said that the table was in fact noticeably compressed cardboard of some sort with the print on it, but that it wasn’t very noticeable. It’s pretty decent but you definitely get what you pay for. I will say that the print is very durable and has not had any issues with water damage despite a few spills.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Great Table
customer_reviews.text: I bought this table used but in Like New condition, and when this table arrived, it was slightly damaged and did not have any of the bolts needed to assemble it. However, these issues were resolved with Amazon customer service, and I had to go purchase bolts myself (you can find the size of bolts by going to the manufacturer’s website and looking up the assembly instructions). Although the table is still slightly damaged, it’s really cute, and you can barely tell.
customer_reviews.author: MarissaTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: This table is EVERYTHING!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered one coffee table and two of the matching side tables. I cannot say how much I love the set, wow! Faux marble looks real enough, all parts arrived intact and on time. Gold is not as shiny as I wanted but the matte finish is growing on me! As someone who dreads the thought of building furniture, assembly was actually super easy and took no more than 15 minutes per table. Very sturdy and sleek and adds the perfect touch to my "glam" themed living room. I would recommend to anyone, the only reason I give 4 stars is because I wish the coffee table was a little taller and maybe 1 foot wider in diameter
customer_reviews.author: Liv

customer_reviews.title: Cute Little Table
customer_reviews.text: I needed something that was not going to take up a lot of space in my living room. This is the perfect size (see photos). The table I replaced with this, was 24". This is smaller and perfect for what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: A JUDIE

customer_reviews.title: Great size and easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: Update 9/10/19: the finish around the edges of the table are lifting up. This is a great size to bring up over the couch and looks great! Very simple to put together and is done with no power tools in roughly 5-10 minutes. It has held anywhere from food, laptop, a pile of books, and hasn't tipped or fallen. My husband kept stealing mine, so I ended up ordering a 2nd!
customer_reviews.author: Smalls

customer_reviews.title: Cute looking, but cannot feel the difference from cheaper table
customer_reviews.text: So it's cute looking, with the right color combination I wanted so I bought it. I don't regret it, but I did find a similar looking side table at Walmart that costs 15 bucks. (Not exactly sure, but definitely not over $20). And honestly, I cannot tell the difference. Both has faux marble top (laminated), and legs with gold-ish looking finish. Both need assembly. Only difference would be slight height difference and shape, round top vs square top, and crossed legs. For me that is not worth 2-3 times the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Jean

customer_reviews.title: Cute table!
customer_reviews.text: This table is a great value for the price. I do wish the materials were a little bit more durable, but for the price I paid there are no complaints. The table top is faux marble, but is wrapped/covered well, and we haven't had any issues with scratching which I was initially worried about. The table looks really nice, and I appreciate that there are matching companion pieces if desired. Table was easy to put together, came with all the pieces and pre-drilled portions it should have. I would buy this again!
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlin Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price tag
customer_reviews.text: This product looks good online, but when you get it, the faux marble looks very very cheap. Also when we put it together, it didn’t align on the corner so it looked pretty shoddy. Fortunately the one corner was hidden a little bit by the bed but if it had been out by a couch, it would’ve been very noticeable. Definitely very cheap looking overall. I feel like I spent way too much money for something that was definitely not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: JS

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice but wobbly on carpet
customer_reviews.text: The table is the look I needed and serves its purpose in my daughter's nursery. I needed something next to the glider chair to rest bottles or drinks on. It is pretty and matches the decor well. Only problem is the table is not very sturdy and I will not keep it in her room once she is mobile and crawling around in fear it will fall over (and the glass on top will come down too). Regardless of carpet, I do not think if the floors were a hard surface it would be much better. For the price, it serves its purpose for now.
customer_reviews.author: Ricki Goldman

customer_reviews.title: good value
customer_reviews.text: this table was easy to assemble. one person in 15 min. its secure. the holes line up well. there was enough hardware. it was delivered in pretty good condition. it looks like it was purchased in a home town furniture store. i would recommend this table. i ordered two.
customer_reviews.author: mr

customer_reviews.title: Pretty, but use a coaster!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely gorgeous, just as pretty as the coffee table version I got this with. I was disappointed that the white marble top seems to made of a weaker material than the coffee table from this same brand, which I found out the hard way after I had a wet drink on it with no coaster. Left deep water spots that did eventually go away, but only after a few hours (Scrubbing didn’t help).
customer_reviews.author: anonymous

customer_reviews.title: A disappointment
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited for this table to arrive that when it did, my husband wasted no time to unpack it for assembly. In less than 5 minutes, discovered three issues (1) Part #3 was missing; (2) the base has the hole pattern drilled incorrectly and (3) there is no hole for the middle strut. Returning it immediately and will not waste any more time contacting this vendor. This vendor is on my blacklist effective today and will warn family and friends.
customer_reviews.author: Maeishes

customer_reviews.title: The product came damaged! I turn it upside down ...
customer_reviews.text: The product came damaged! I turn it upside down after the installation and I see the scratch & damaged!! Even the legs are crooked. Once I turned it upside down, its got crooked legs.
customer_reviews.author: Kal

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: Item came scratched and the faux marble is already peeling off after only a few days. Not very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Coto

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a touch of elegance
customer_reviews.text: I luv this table I just received it Wensday 7/29. So I did a full inspection on this table and there were no scrapes peeling or bent legs as I read in some reviews also it took less than ten minutes to put together with no response instructions needed as you can see I added a marble serving dish at the bottom for a little pizzazz lol to hold my coasters. Sets off my room nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Nakia Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Adorable, but came with damages
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely beautiful in person, it’s fake marble like a laminated top. I think this will stain if you don’t use coasters. I’m just sad that it came with scratches on the metal legs.
customer_reviews.author: Rainie

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: This coffee table is beautiful and elegant; obviously the top is not real marble (otherwise you'd pay a lot more), but it looks like it from afar, and even up close it's a thick top piece and very sturdy. The top is stained wood, I believe. The gold is beautiful, and I love the criss-cross pattern. This table is also very easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Looks ok but wobbles a lot
customer_reviews.text: Overall the product looks as advertised in the picture. It has a faux marble top (greyish white with grey veins) and matt gold metal frame. The top however is quite glossy and will reflect a lot of light if placed close to a window (unlike real marble). I did not mind that so much, as I knew I was buying faux marble. My main complaint is that both the tables that I bought wobble. A lot. And are not as sturdy. Would have liked to see a better built frame.
customer_reviews.author: Sp

customer_reviews.title: Already came peeled around edging.
customer_reviews.text: For the price, it's decent. It came unassembled, but assembling it took about 5 minutes. It comes with 5 screws and a little alan wrench so you don't need additional tools to put it together. I gave it two stars because the edge of the top came already peeled (picture below) with air bubbles..so it's not smooth all around the edge. Once assembled, it's wobbly when you touch it, otherwise if you let it sit there it looks fine.
customer_reviews.author: Gney

customer_reviews.title: Cheap but easy to assemble and looks decent
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this and it arrived damaged. The screws were stripped and I was unable to utilize 2/4 screws. It is unstable (likely due to half the screws not in place). The top is press board with a paper covering. I would not purchase this again for the price. You can find a cheaper, better quality table elsewhere. On the plus side, it is very easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Puja

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Has a nice, clean look. Very easy to put together. No tools required. Instructions can be ready by a 10 year old Cons: Not very sturdy. Marble top is fake, weighs nothing (piece of plastic with marble like look). Legs are lightweight metal that was spray painted gold. In certain places you can tell it wasn't done properly (see pictures)
customer_reviews.author: Esther

customer_reviews.title: Looks good, but cheap
customer_reviews.text: For similar price, go with something with a real marble top and real metal legs. The table top is cheap fiberboard with a marble veneer. The legs are spray painted gold. The table itself wobbles. I've seen similar tables from world market, wayfair, pier1, all for around the same price, with quality material. Looks good as a stage piece, but don't expect it to last
customer_reviews.author: Kyle M

customer_reviews.title: Great coffee table, assemble on rug/carpet to avoid scratches
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to assemble - took me maybe 5 minutes. It does scratch VERY easily when assembling, but I had no issues as I was careful and assembled on a rug. This coffee table is strudy enough for me to rest my feet on and goes well with my decor. I do wish the gold was a little lighter, but overall I am very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine L.

customer_reviews.title: I'm an idiot at assembling things but this was a cinch and it looks GREAT. One of my more stellar buy's on Amazon
customer_reviews.text: NIfty, elegant end table. What a deal...Pier 1 Imports sold it for $117 - I bought it for $60 here on Amazon. I'm an idiot at assembling things but this was a cinch and it looks GREAT. One of my more stellar buy's on Amazon, that is for sure (It was higher all the way around on Jet.com)
customer_reviews.author: Peggie Davis, Las Vegas, NV.

customer_reviews.title: Great for small spaces, easy to assemble,  C-Table
customer_reviews.text: The ONLY thing I dislike is I have to be careful with putting coasters under drink glasses so the surface doesn't start to disintegrate. It's good value for the money and looks classy (as long as you don't inspect the top surface too closely). The "marble" is faux and I knew this in advance. Love the ability to slide this under the edge of a sofa/chair and use as a C-table. Be sure to take measurements as it probably is too low to go over the end of the sofa/chair arm.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Waller

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy this table
customer_reviews.text: I bought this table recently and began to peel, because if the top is like paper or a similar material. I have written 2 emails to the seller and he has been unable to answer, it seems unusual to me that a table with such poor finishes and such a poor quantity is so expensive. very disappointing, I do not recommend this product at all
customer_reviews.author: Yuya

customer_reviews.title: A $30 table at best
customer_reviews.text: Bought two for $62 each. Both wobble a bit, and the faux marble is a mediocre laminate. But the biggest issue is that on the 2nd table there's a dent in the metal of one of the legs and I can't get the table top in. Returning furniture is a PITA so I'm just going to ask my husband to try to pry the metal apart or bang the top in with a rubber mallet
customer_reviews.author: DCHoo

customer_reviews.title: I like it but wouldn’t recommend it
customer_reviews.text: The table looks great in my living room. It is cheaply made and the marble top was a little chip. It was not enough for me to ship back but it’s there. Supposedly the package was delivered on Sunday and I actually got it on Tuesday. It is easy to assemble and I did it by myself. You only screw 5 pieces to assemble it together and the screw do not go in evenly. Pros -Pretty -Easy to Assemble Cons - False delivery date - Tiny chip on marble part - Screws don’t screw in evenly - Tiny chip
customer_reviews.author: Explorer

customer_reviews.title: Ok but not as shown
customer_reviews.text: The top is definitely not marble. If anything it's a thin layer of formica - not terribly sturdy and I suspect, not very repellent of water or stains. Also the table-top rim shows gold in the picture but the rim on mine is PAPER and the paper is coming unglued after a month of very light use. . . A nice look overall, but not the best quality or durability.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Affordable and look fine
customer_reviews.text: You definitely get what you pay for! This item is super cheap and I was thrilled with the price. In person I realized it is so cheap because it is fake lightweight materials, though for how little I paid I can’t say I’m mad. I bought two for either side of my couch and they look fine.
customer_reviews.author: Abbey Co. Seattle

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely NOT marble. It’s cheap composite wood.
customer_reviews.text: This is absolutely NOT faux marble. The top is made of composite wood with a cheap marble colored laminate. I have purchased similar tables that are made of faux marble - being powdered marble that is cast and indistinguishable from genuine marble. This is NOT that. This is cheap, not shiny, not smooth and doesn’t look a thing like marble. I am returning it immediately, as the title of this item is 100% false.
customer_reviews.author: Ardent V.

customer_reviews.title: Top layer chipped off :(
customer_reviews.text: I love this table so much, however it came damaged. After reading the reviews, sadly I'm not surprised.. but I wanted to take a chance anyways. The top layer of the table arrived chipping off all along the sides and one huge chunk was missing. This table would be perfect if it was manufactured properly!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy!!
customer_reviews.text: Cheap, terrible material, packaged terrible. The box was all torn up. I returned this a month ago and still have yet to see my refund.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie & Raphael

customer_reviews.title: So terrible, not even worth the cheap price
customer_reviews.text: TERRIBLE. The faux marble top comes attached to the ring base to which the legs are attached. The marble top is off centered from ring base. Didn’t notice as I was putting together the legs. Too late to get my money back. I wasn’t expecting fine finishes for that price but would’ve assumed at least a circle being on center!!! Save your money.
customer_reviews.author: Tamara L Miller

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced but cute
customer_reviews.text: A few small scratches in the top, cheap veneer. One of the screws holding the gold rim onto the top was stripped and I needed to replace it. But overall it fits well in our small apartment and looks nice. Overpriced for what it is. We also ordered two of the matching round side tables. One came in with some of the veneer peeling, glued it back into place. The other one wobbled but my husband was able to rig it to stand straight. The look is exactly what I wanted, but the execution was very poor.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute, sturdy table
customer_reviews.text: Cute table. Exactly what I was looking for. A little expensive. I was going to buy another one but the price went up. The glass had some rust colored stains. They aren't noticable since the lamp blocks them, but still.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer A.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect little table
customer_reviews.text: I needed something next to my bed that matched everything, and I love it. Hold a lamp, a little plant, and a picture frame and little things like my phone and remote and stuff. If you're into dainty little furniture for a small space, then this is it. I even put it together myself and my friends were terrified for me to do it, but it was no problem!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tori Ann

customer_reviews.title: Stylish & Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I would definitely recommend this product to anyone who is looking for something like this. It was exactly what I was looking for. I needed something as a side table but that wouldn't take as much space as I have very little of it to begin with. It is sturdy and serves it's purpose. Easy to build. The best part of it all is that is seamlessly meshes with all the other furniture. It is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: J.Rabbit

customer_reviews.title: Cheap looking wobbly table
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed in this product. Assembly was simple but that's about all of the positive. The bolts are all right but the table is still wobbly due to the thin material of the legs. And this shouldn't be labeled as faux marble. The top looks super cheap and has no gloss or anything. Other than the color, there is nothing that resembles marble. Even from a distance it is clear to see that it is a matte vinyl sticker. This thing is not worth more than $25
customer_reviews.author: Brad W.

customer_reviews.title: Very poorly made
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to put together because it was just a few screws. This product is falling apart after a few months of basic use. 3 of the 4 screws holding the top on have fallen out. I knew it was a cheap coffee table but figured it would last longer than a few months. I wish I would have just spent the extra money up front on a decent table.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Vampola

customer_reviews.title: Completely damaged.
customer_reviews.text: The double box package the table came in was completely opened and damaged. So much so I couldn’t use it to ship it back to return it. The legs of the table came in completely scratched showing on the side that is visible. The top also seems to have water damage and came with scratches. The top isn’t marble but particle board with marble paint. Overall it’s a cute table but quite disappointing how it came in and isn’t nearly as quality as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis Jabbour

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: Table Is garbage. Had the table for a few months and it’s sitting outside in my garage because it looks so dang raggedy now. This table is super cheap and flimsy. After a while my table started getting little bubbles in the marble on the top. I’m starting to think it only has a layer of contact paper over the top. The sides chipped off. Save your money!
customer_reviews.author: Kay

customer_reviews.title: More than a few screws loose....
customer_reviews.text: Received on time, legs were scratched, the threads were either poorly drilled or paint obstructed the threads because it took 30 minutes to get 3 leg screws in and I never could get the 4th. When I turned the table over hoping to make do with only 3 leg screws I realized the top was also damaged to a point that I could not ignore. I will return and try 1 more time with this product only because my daughter has the matching end tables (which have a few scratches as well-but tolerable)
customer_reviews.author: Tara L. Morris

customer_reviews.title: Cheap materials
customer_reviews.text: So cheap. I am so disappointed in this purchase. It makes me hesitate to even buy anything on Amazon anymore. Such cheap material - not marble or metal. Plastic. Crap.
customer_reviews.author: Bree

customer_reviews.title: Classic, sturdy , easy to assemble , beautiful marble finish !
customer_reviews.text: It was very easy to assemble! I assembled it myself and I’m a single mom. Only took about thirty minutes. I was worried if the marble top would look cheap or not but it’s absolutely classic and looks like real marble .... love how large the top of the table is ( you can easily place a cup of coffee and a vase with flowers ). I chose the one with chrome legs to go with my light fixture .
customer_reviews.author: Maria in Seattle!

customer_reviews.title: Not how it look in pictures. It looked way bigger in picture
customer_reviews.text: Okay so I knew it was not real marble but I expected it to be a Little heavier. It seemed very heavy/ sturdy in photos. Are legs are not even and look very bad. The screws did not match and I am not one to care. I read all the reviews and I thought it can not be that bad. Yes! Yes it is. And I saw the measurement but it looked way bigger in the photos Do you see in my picture how the legs are slated looking. Otherwise
customer_reviews.author: elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Really cute table
customer_reviews.text: I am pretty happy with this table. It's the look I wanted. I also got the matching side table. My only issue with the two items is although they look really nice I feel the pricing is too high for what you get. I don't regret buying them but I have bought nicer furniture for less.
customer_reviews.author: C. grundy

customer_reviews.title: Does not hold up well for long term. Shoddy material.
customer_reviews.text: After about a year of owning this table, it is completely destroyed. The top layer has peeled off in multiple spots. If you get any water on it, even if you wipe it up right away, the top gets messed up. Also it has been shaky despite proper assembly since I purchased it. Does not hold up well.
customer_reviews.author: Cleay

customer_reviews.title: Not 100% satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Table top is not centered with legs; some area a around the table top have a lip and some areas are flushed with the legs. The table top is faux marble (I knew this) but is already peeling and makes it more obvious. Cute but not as sturdy as I would’ve liked and could probably find a better table elsewhere for this price point. Has a cute and simple look, easy to assemble, and comes with needed Allen wrench to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Darlene

customer_reviews.title: Very nice table, but now overpriced
customer_reviews.text: This table is sturdy, easy to assemble and has a very nice gold color. my only issue with it was the top, its paper. So as you can see from the picture mine has begun to bubble because not everyone at home remembers to use a coaster. I think it is now overpriced.
customer_reviews.author: Luisa

customer_reviews.title: Cheap looking!!!
customer_reviews.text: The item listing says "Top Material: Marble" - untrue! It's pressed particle board covered by cheap-looking plastic veneer. Opened the box and didn't even bother assembling - returned RIGHT away. For $70, there's no way I'm satisfied with plywood.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Pangelinan

customer_reviews.title: Cheap!!!!
customer_reviews.text: These trays are cute only in the picture! They are SO cheap looking! The rubber suction pieces to keep the glass on never stay in. The chrome is scratched SO bad all over !! It is so light,& you can tell it’s cheap. For the money it should be a bit more stable! They are cute. But that’s all!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality, damaged product
customer_reviews.text: Was very excited about this little table..packaging was fine...quality of work was not. The metal “tab” to attach legs was welded on at an angle, not allowing the screw to fit. One of the legs was bent completely in half on both sides of screw port. And table felt cheap - it is not marble but a picture of marble (almost like a wallpaper over hard plastic). Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY THIS TABLE!!!
customer_reviews.text: Not three hours after I had assembled this table, I accidentally put a sticker on the table. “No worries,” I thought to myself, “It’s just a sticker!” Well, it turned out to be this table’s kryptonite. As I peeled off the sticker, I watched in horror as the marble print came away with the sticker. I had no idea that the marble was on printed paper, but now I want my money back. This is not worth the $135 and the manufacturers should be ashamed of themselves for putting something like this on the market. 0/5 stars!
customer_reviews.author: Sophia Diomande

customer_reviews.title: It’s alright....
customer_reviews.text: I’m not going to lie, you get what you pay for. I’m not entirely upset with the table because it does the job and looks exactly as pictured, BUT the quality is cheap. I mean, it’s faux marble but it’s not even shiny. It’s almost like Formica counter tops and super light weight. If you’re looking for cheap, this does the job. If you want something a little shiny and better looking, order a used one off offerup or marketplace. Still a nice table!
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Valdes

customer_reviews.title: Poor materials even for the price
customer_reviews.text: I am so disappointed. I was so excited for this piece, but the tabletop is so cheap, it already has scratches on it from simple things like a remote controller or plate being sat on it. Sure it’s not an incredibly expensive table but this is just a rip off. Seal the table top with something good if you want it to actually function like a coffee table and not just sit there never being touched.
customer_reviews.author: christina

customer_reviews.title: Not a glossy faux marble didnt like
customer_reviews.text: Looks like a formica top not what i expected and now that it is assembled too hard to return. Doesn’t match the side table purchased. Ended up purchasing a different faux marble looks more authentic, second pic and that matches the side table.
customer_reviews.author: colleen

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking, if it arrives without damage.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered two of these in gold/walnut. One arrived with deep scratches in the finish of the “wood” table top. Other than that, they look pretty good and don’t wobble. I used Walker Edison’s support form to report the issue. Even though the form has you list the specific item, including the metal and wood colors, they sent me a replacement in the wrong color. So, five stars for what I was supposed to receive. One star for customer service attention to detail. Average of three stars.
customer_reviews.author: Rubber Biscuit

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful! I was looking at Wayfair for a similar product, but their price was much higher for a table of the same looks. I am a big fan of this coffee table style because it is so simple, but it is elegant looking. This really pulls my room together nicely. It is big and super sturdy. Absolutely love this buy and couldn't be happier with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Noelle (Elle)

customer_reviews.title: great for the price
customer_reviews.text: item was a little shorter than I thought it would be, and my fear from reading other reviews about receiving a damaged product came true but it was a minor ding I could live with so I decided to keep it. For the price it is pretty sweet piece of furniture if you are on a budget, If you take care of your things this would definitely enhance your space. I got this for a clients house i am remodeling and it definitely gave the space some class. with a few accessories and coasters (do not get this table wet) it works great
customer_reviews.author: Gadgetguy

customer_reviews.title: They make money not keep customers happy
customer_reviews.text: So I’ve had my table 90 days and it has started to warp. I do not use any abrasive cleaners or cups or liquids near it. I contacted amazon who plunged my me to “Walker Edison’s” website. Upon contacting them I was told “we can sell you a new tabletop because it’s been more than 30 days.” They also mentioned it was due to outside elements when this is an indoor table. Never would I purchase from WE again and if you want to spend money and pay to their manufacturing defects steer clear.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Overall happy
customer_reviews.text: As expected, happy with it. Was easy enough to assemble, came with one tiny scratch in top, not enough to return. All in all a decent table. I knew buying that top is wood and not real marble, that's what i was looking for - matches my new coffee table top (purchased from pier1) EXACTLY!
customer_reviews.author: PSC

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and doesn't feel cheap.
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't wobble, my 13-inch laptop fits perfectly on it and the marble pattern is very pretty! Great quality for the price! Super easy to put together. ( I put it together with 5 screws in about 3 minutes.) Would definitely recommend this end table!
customer_reviews.author: Rosie's Momma

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble, sturdy, looks great!
customer_reviews.text: Very easy assembly. My major concerns were that the table would be wobbly or not sturdy, or that it would look cheap. Fortunately, neither is true. It seems very sturdy after simple assembly, and both the gold and the glass look substantial. The glass itself is thick enough that I’m not worried about it breaking easily. Very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Murphy Magee

customer_reviews.title: Great little side table!
customer_reviews.text: Love this little table! So easy to assemble. They even sent the tool to do it. The packing was very good so the table base and glass top were safe. The only thing that holds the glass top on are 4 small suction cups. So I wouldn’t put it in a high traffic area. But for a non traffic area it’s great. The top stays on with mild disturbances.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Recommend Buying
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this coffee table and the matching end table. Both were super easy to put together and they fit the space in the room perfectly. After owning the pieces for a few months, I’ve discovered that the top and edges of the tables are made of a paper type product and cannot be exposed to ANY moisture at all. I inadvertently left a damp (not wet) towel on the coffee table and the edge of the table lifted. I tried to “re-stick” the paper and the photo shows the best I could do. I am so, so disappointed. I’ve reached out to Walker Edison and I’ve gotten no response from them.
customer_reviews.author: KK

customer_reviews.title: Great Mid Century Design
customer_reviews.text: Marble look for less! You can barely tell it isn’t real marble. Walnut finish is flawless
customer_reviews.author: PerkiJr

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok
customer_reviews.text: I like it. It fits well in the space. Price point is a bit high considering it’s just wood and metal and no marble. The picture on the advert shows a shiny marble looking top. But it’s matte wood with contact paper.
customer_reviews.author: Nisha

customer_reviews.title: Need Hardware
customer_reviews.text: I love the table. It’s beautiful. However, I gave it one star for assembly and sturdiness since my package didn’t have any hardware included to secure the table. I sent an email to their customer service and will be glad to update my rating if/when they send me the hardware.
customer_reviews.author: K. Huggs

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty table for show
customer_reviews.text: This table is gorgeous, but a bit overpriced. I think it’s a tiny bit wobbly, so keep that in consideration when you order that it’s not going to be very heavy and sturdy. More for light weight items and for show.
customer_reviews.author: Suzears

customer_reviews.title: NOT MARBLE! Cheap
customer_reviews.text: The top is NOT MARBLE. It is a “marble” printed contact paper-type covering that just looks white(not much striation to it). Sturdy enough, but NOT a heavy duty piece of furniture. Definitely not worthy of the price I paid. I got a side table nearly 3 times the first size of this for only a few dollars more from World Market that was actually marble. I would have paid maybe $20 for this if I had seen it in person before purchasing...
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlin C

customer_reviews.title: CHEAP,  but super cute
customer_reviews.text: This is super cute, but not even close to marble. It's like particle board with a marble look wall paper over it. Certainly NOT worth $60. SO, just be aware of what you're buying. It's cheap and cute, but it weighs less than 6/7lbs, and there is no stone at all! We'll see how long it lasts.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: As advertised
customer_reviews.text: They're fine. Easy enough to out together and look exactly as they do in the picture. Materials look a little cheap (no one is mistaking the top for actual marble) but I'd say that's reflected in the item cost so I can't compalin.
customer_reviews.author: C. King

product_meta.title: Walker Edison Furniture Company Modern Round Coffee Accent Table Living Room, Glass/Gold
product_meta.description: Color:Glass/Gold| Style:Coffee TableStyle meets practical with this mid century modern inspired round coffee table with a crisscross designed base. The x-base is made of metal, painted in gold for a splash of elegance. It is sure to please on its own, or when styled with our matching side table, while complementing any living room aesthetic. Tie the whole room together even more, by decorating the round table top with a tray to place books, a clock, or artistic pieces on.
feature_bullets: Dimensions: 19” H x 36” L x 36” W
Durable, tempered glass table top for long-lasting construction
Pair with matching side table for a complete living room set

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars1,860 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
